''' 2nd OFCC Awards '''
December 23, 2007
----
Best Film:
'''''No Country for Old Men'''''
The '''2nd Oklahoma Film Critics Circle Awards''', honouring the best filmmaking of [[2007 in film|2007]], were given on 23 December 2007. ==Top 10 Films== #''[[No Country for Old Men (film)|No Country for Old Men]]'' #''[[Juno (film)|Juno]]'' #''[[Zodiac (film)|Zodiac]]'' #''[[Atonement (film)|Atonement]]'' #''[[Michael Clayton (film)|Michael Clayton]]'' #''[[Before the Devil Knows You're Dead]]'' #''[[The King of Kong: A Fistful of Quarters]]'' #''[[Gone Baby Gone]]'' #''[[Once (film)|Once]]'' #''[[Eastern Promises]]'' ==Winners== *Best Actor: **[[George Clooney]] - ''[[Michael Clayton (film)|Michael Clayton]]'' *Best Actress: **[[Ellen Page]] - ''[[Juno (film)|Juno]]'' *Best Animated Feature: **''[[Ratatouille (film)|Ratatouille]]'' *Best Director: **[[Ethan Coen|Ethan]] and [[Joel Coen]] - ''[[No Country for Old Men (film)|No Country for Old Men]]'' *Best Documentary Feature: **''[[The King of Kong: A Fistful of Quarters]]'' *Best Film: **'''''[[No Country for Old Men (film)|No Country for Old Men]]''''' *Best First Film: **''[[Gone Baby Gone]]'' - [[Ben Affleck]] *Best Foreign Language Film: **''[[The Diving Bell and the Butterfly (film)|Le scaphandre et le papillon (The Diving Bell and the Butterfly)]]'', [[France]]/[[USA]] *Best Supporting Actor: **[[Javier Bardem]] - ''[[No Country for Old Men (film)|No Country for Old Men]]'' *Best Supporting Actress: **[[Amy Ryan]] - ''[[Gone Baby Gone]]'' *Breakout Performance: **[[Ellen Page]] - ''[[Juno (film)|Juno]]'' *Obviously Worst Film: **''[[Norbit (film)|Norbit]]'' {{OFCC Awards Chron}} [[Category:2007 film awards]] [[Category:Oklahoma Film Critics Circle Awards]]
